turns.content:
[Partner Cooperation Team] Share webinar schedule for Cafe24 employees
hello. This is a partnership team.
To have time to share information about 'partner service/market' necessary for customer consulting
I was planning a webinar for internal employees.
Date: February 9th (Thursday) 3pm
Target: Enterprise (customer contact department)
Content: 100% utilization, Cafe24 partner service
Entering the global market using Market Plus
1. Introduction of Market Plus
2. Introduction to global markets - Joom (entry into European market) / MSS (entry into Japanese market)
Pre-Q&A reception: https://forms.gle/mpJZGdii9HQoucic8
Please check the webinar access link in the reminder notice next week.

A webinar for cafe24 employees will be held with the above contents. Using this content, we plan to create content for an in-house blog site that helps Cafe24 employees understand how to enter the global market using Market Plus. Please write a detailed outline.

Agenda for Cafe24 Employee Webinar:

I. Introduction

* Brief overview of the partnership team and the purpose of the webinar

II. 100% Utilization of Cafe24 Partner Service

* Explanation of the importance of utilizing the partner services offered by Cafe24
* Discussion of the various benefits and advantages of utilizing the services

III. Introduction to Market Plus

* Overview of Market Plus and its purpose
* Discussion of its key features and how it can help with entering the global market

IV. Introduction to Global Markets

* Overview of the Joom platform and its entry into the European market
* Overview of the MSS platform and its entry into the Japanese market
* Explanation of how Market Plus can help with entry into these markets

V. Pre-Q&A Reception

* Explanation of the pre-Q&A reception and how it works
* Encouragement for employees to submit their questions in advance

VI. Q&A Session

* Time set aside for answering questions from attendees

VII. Closing

* Summary of key points discussed during the webinar
* Reminder of the access link for the webinar
* Final thoughts and next steps

Note: The webinar link will be shared in the reminder notice next week.
Rewrite, including concepts to be emphasized

Agenda for Cafe24 Employee Webinar:

I. Purpose and Overview

* Explanation of the partnership team and its role
* Emphasis on the importance of sharing information about partner services and markets

II. Maximizing Cafe24 Partner Services

* Highlighting the benefits and advantages of utilizing the partner services offered by Cafe24
* Discussion of the impact of full utilization on customer consulting

III. Unlocking Global Markets with Market Plus

* Overview of Market Plus and its purpose
* Emphasis on its key features and how it can help Cafe24 employees enter the global market

IV. Joom and MSS: Exploring Global Opportunities

* Introduction to the Joom platform and its entry into the European market
* Overview of the MSS platform and its entry into the Japanese market
* Emphasis on the potential for growth in these markets and how Market Plus can facilitate entry

V. Pre-Webinar Q&A

* Explanation of the pre-Q&A reception and its importance
* Encouragement for employees to submit their questions ahead of time

VI. Interactive Q&A Session

* Time set aside for answering questions from attendees
* Emphasis on the opportunity for employees to have their questions answered directly

VII. Wrapping Up

* Summary of key points discussed during the webinar
* Emphasis on the importance of taking action based on the information shared
* Reminder of the webinar access link, which will be shared in the reminder notice next week.
